name: Clash of Cuisine
description:
NOTE: Game entry not finished yet!

Game entry for gamedevjs 2022.

Lore

Professor Gaffer's scientists have been doing experiments on raw ingredients to create the ultimate power dishes for the football players on Mars. The dishes however turned out to mutate into mini football players. The MPL has it's own underground league for raw, brutal, mutated dishes. Players compete to be the master of the underground.

Controls

Long click your unit and release to send it flying. The goal is to score as many goals as possible before the time runs out. You play against a super martian AI.

Decentralized

If you want to use NEAR features, check the game out at https://clash-of-cuisine.4everland.app/. You can mint your own MPL character on the NEAR (testnet) blockchain. The character will be playable in-game, and also visible in your NEAR (testnet) wallet.

The NFT-metadata contains the image of the minted MLP player, stored on IPFS:  https://ipfs.io/ipfs/bafkreiazoeuo2cnyc5b77vzqvoj2v2gxtd6wdrn65xhsjokighwkpzatsq. 

Web monetization

Coil subscribers can play as Professor Gaffer.
